overview: Musical - Soprano Anna Moffo stars as winsome courtesan Violetta Valery -- who tries to protect her rash lover, Alfredo (Franco Bonisolli), even if it means lying and breaking his heart -- in this 1968 version of composer Giuseppe Verdi's masterpiece. Recorded at the Rome Opera House with renowned conductor Giuseppe Patan√® leading the orchestra and chorus, the production also stars Gino Bechi as Alfredo's angst-ridden father. -  Anna Moffo, Gino Bechi, Franco Bonisolli
title: La traviata
